Enum Class Orientation

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Orientation>
edu.wit.scds.ds.lists.app.card_game.universal_base.support.Orientation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Orientation>, Constable
public enum Orientation extends Enum<Orientation>
Represents the orientation of a Card (face up or face down). When a Card is face up, its designation (for example, "Aâ™¦") is visible and will be displayed. When face down, a placeholder designation is displayed (for example, "--").
Version:
1.0 2025-06-26 Initial implementation - replaces boolean constants for face up/down specification, 2.0 2025-07-12 add AS_IS and FLIP to support pile-level specification
Author:
David M Rosenberg
